export var bfs=function bfs(grid,pairGrid,mazeGraph,startNode,endNode){var m=grid.length,n=grid[0].length;// Initialize the predecessor array
var predecessor=[];predecessor.fill(startNode,0,m*n);predecessor[startNode.id]=startNode;// Initialize the visited nodes array
var visited=[];// Initialize the Queue
return[visited,[]];};
